name: The Challenge (itch) (Daxxboii)
description:
The MC is a transfer student in the school. and there has been a myth going around regarding a girl who gave up her life, 2 yrs ago in the chemistry lab. 

The school is situated in a rural, country area, so had very little attention to detail, seems like a old run down school, with only 3 classrooms

 One night, the MC and his other friends, are doing a test of courage and he is challenged to go to the school at 3am and write his name in the chemistry lab wall The MC goes to the school.

 This is where the game begins...

Controls:-

WASD - Move

Mouse Click - Interact

F - Special missions /  activations
